name: Windows 7 / Windows XP Games Pack
description:
I have decided to rip ALL of the games from my Windows XP and Windows 7 VM so yall can play them!

All games work offline!

Note: The Internet Game servers have been shut down so they no longer work. They are not included in this pack.

System Requirements:

Windows XP Game Pack: 

OS: Windows XP or newer

RAM: 256MB

Storage: 16MB free

Windows 7 Game Pack:

OS: Windows 7 or newer

RAM: 512MB

Storage: 128MB free
